entry.title: Pelican start
entry.summary: This is a new post using a new theme. All this week and last week has been dedicated to figure out how to change theme in Pelican. I wanted to use a simple responsive website theme with an easy access menu bar. Also I noticed that the menu bar did not displayed categories the way I wanted, so I have to read the documentation to make it work the way I . For now I will just add post to the content folder so I can get things going. Later, I plan to make changes as I get familial with markdown and jinjan2.

entry.title: First Post
entry.summary: This is my first githubpages post. There will be more changes as I work with Pelicana static site generator. I want to use Pelican becauese is written in Python and that will give me the opportunity to continue leaning Python. There will be changes to this site as I work and continue learning using Pelican and Python.
